title: SAM.gov Scraper Input
description: Scrape federal contract opportunities from SAM.gov with full attachment download - NO API KEY REQUIRED

keywords.title: Search Keywords
keywords.description: Search terms to filter opportunities (e.g., 'software development', 'cybersecurity', 'cloud migration')

naicsCodes.title: NAICS Codes
naicsCodes.description: Filter by industry codes. Common IT: 541511 (Programming), 541512 (Systems Design), 541519 (Other IT), 518210 (Data/Hosting), 541690 (Consulting)

setAsideTypes.title: Set-Aside Types
setAsideTypes.description: Filter by set-aside: SBA (Small Business), 8A (8a Program), HZC (HUBZone), SDVOSBC (Service-Disabled Vet), WOSB (Women-Owned), EDWOSB

opportunityTypes.title: Opportunity Types
opportunityTypes.description: Filter by type: o (Solicitation), k (Combined Synopsis), p (Presolicitation), r (Sources Sought), s (Special Notice), a (Award)

states.title: Place of Performance States
states.description: Filter by state codes where work will be performed (e.g., CA, TX, VA, DC)

postedWithinDays.title: Posted Within (Days)
postedWithinDays.description: Only fetch opportunities posted within this many days

maxOpportunities.title: Maximum Results
maxOpportunities.description: Maximum number of opportunities to scrape (higher = longer runtime)

downloadAttachments.title: Download Attachments
downloadAttachments.description: Download RFPs, SOWs, pricing templates, and other documents

extractText.title: Extract PDF Text
extractText.description: Extract searchable text from PDF attachments (slower but enables full-text search)
